SELECT yr_dt AS baseDate , unit , val FROM min_pay WHERE yr_dt = ( SELECT yr_dt FROM min_pay ORDER BY yr_dt DESC
)

SELECT yr_dt AS yrDt , mon_dt AS monDt , CONCAT(yr_dt, '.', mon_dt) AS baseDate , unit , val FROM cnsmr_inrt WHERE CONCAT(yr_dt, mon_dt) = ( SELECT CONCAT(yr_dt, mon_dt) FROM cnsmr_inrt ORDER BY CONCAT(yr_dt, mon_dt) DESC
)

) AND cty_nm = '전국'

SELECT yr_dt AS baseDate , unit , gni_val AS val FROM gni_capita WHERE yr_dt = ( SELECT yr_dt FROM gni_capita ORDER BY yr_dt DESC
)

SELECT yr_dt, ROUND(val, 2) AS val, '물가상승률' AS type FROM cnsmr_inrt WHERE yr_dt BETWEEN #{searchDate} AND (SELECT MAX(yr_dt) FROM cnsmr_inrt) AND IF(yr_dt = YEAR (NOW()), mon_dt = (SELECT MAX(mon_dt) FROM cnsmr_inrt WHERE yr_dt = YEAR(NOW())), mon_dt = (SELECT MAX(mon_dt) FROM cnsmr_inrt)) UNION ALL SELECT yr_dt, inrt AS val, '최저임금상승률' AS type FROM min_pay_inrt WHERE yr_dt BETWEEN #{searchDate} AND (SELECT MAX(yr_dt) FROM min_pay_inrt) UNION ALL SELECT yr_dt, rate AS val, '평균임금상승' AS type FROM wage_inrt WHERE yr_dt BETWEEN #{searchDate} AND (SELECT MAX(yr_dt) FROM wage_inrt) AND cty_nm = '전국'
SELECT cty_nm, val FROM enmc_grrt WHERE yr_dt = #{searchDate} AND cty_nm NOT IN ('전국') ORDER BY val
SELECT cty_nm, val FROM enmc_grrt WHERE yr_dt = (SELECT MAX(yr_dt) FROM enmc_grrt) AND cty_nm NOT IN ('전국') ORDER BY val

SELECT yr_dt, ages, val FROM ovrss_trip WHERE yr_dt BETWEEN #{searchDate} AND (SELECT yr_dt FROM ovrss_trip ORDER BY yr_dt DESC LIMIT 1)
